description: 2 days and I still haven't got it to work, headache, will look for something else.

It's actually pretty good for what I needed. However, it has a couple of issues that make it a bit unfriendly to users. 

First, it doesn't create automatically a shortcut in the Applications (or System) menu. This makes it hard to just launch the program.

Second, the daemon has an icon, but the configuration app doesn't. I had to find it to create the shortcut (If you're reading this and trying to create it, use the command xfce4-notifyd-config, you can also launch it from Terminal).

Third, both its best strength and a minor weakness: it allows you a huge amount of customization, but you need to write it on a CSS file. The configuration program should launch a second window for creating themes. It wasn't that hard to create my own, but there's a few things in it that seem to be missing.
summary: Feels almost like a beta version

description: doctorin pfofissorin ingrid berta bruckmeier sattlerweg 17 85406 zollig
